title: Open Mic Night at Eichard's
description: Biobeat hosts monthly open mic at one of Sandpoint’s best venues.

title: Open Mic Night at IPA
description: Come sing, play, or vibe with the locals every Thursday at Idaho Pour Authority.

title: Summer Art Walk
description: Explore local galleries, meet artists, and sip wine downtown.

title: IF4 Live Event
description: The International Fly Fishing Film Festival (IF4) returns to Sandpoint, showcasing premium fly-fishing films from around the globe. Hosted by House of Fly and The Mayfly Project, the event includes door prizes and giveaways.

title: Bike Rodeo
description: A free event focused on bike safety for kids. Includes helmet giveaways, safety checks, and skill practice sessions.

title: Lost in the '50s Festival
description: A nostalgic celebration featuring a classic car show, parade, and dance concerts. A beloved Sandpoint tradition reliving the 1950s era.

title: Celebration of Life
description: Bonner General Health Community Hospice hosts this event to celebrate the lives of children who have passed.

title: Long Bridge Half Marathon
description: A scenic half marathon with 10km and 5km routes along Lake Pend Oreille. Fast and flat for all runners.

title: Live Music at Smokesmith BBQ
description: Carl Rey & Truck Mills perform at Smokesmith BBQ. Enjoy great food and blues tunes.

title: Comin' Home to Farmers Market
description: Comin' Home band plays at the Sandpoint Farmers Market. Shop local vendors while enjoying live music.

title: Sandra Marlowe Voice Master Class
description: Sandra Marlowe leads a master class on contemporary vocal technique and performance.

title: Cinco de Mayo at Eichardt's Pub
description: Live music, tacos, and a silent auction at Eichardt's Pub for Cinco de Mayo. Benefits Music Bridges Borders.
